Dear IHS Markit Customer,
The IHS Markit Response Management Team has completed your request and closed case number {!Case.CaseNumber} with the subject "{!Case.Subject}".
If you have any additional questions on your onboarding, please quote the above case reference number when contacting us. Someone will be in touch with you shortly to ensure that your request was handled to your satisfaction.
Kind regards, IHS Markit Response Management Team
